meanings.sent1: The special paint fluoresced under the blacklight.
meanings.sent2: The stars fluoresced brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The flowers fluoresced like tiny glowing lanterns in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her smile fluoresced with joy as she opened the gift.
meanings.sent5: The fireflies fluoresced, creating a magical glow in the dark.

meanings.definition: To emit light when exposed to radiation.
meanings.sent1: The watch fluoresced in the dark room after being near the radioactive material.
meanings.sent2: The clock fluoresced green after being near the radioactive substance.
meanings.sent3: The toy car fluoresced after being near the glowing rock.
meanings.sent4: The gemstone fluoresced under the UV light, revealing its hidden beauty.
meanings.sent5: The crystal fluoresced, casting a soft light around the room.

meanings.definition: To produce a visible light when exposed to ultraviolet light.
meanings.sent1: The white shirt fluoresced brightly under the UV lamp.
meanings.sent2: The poster fluoresced under the UV light, revealing hidden patterns.
meanings.sent3: The stickers fluoresced when exposed to the UV flashlight.
meanings.sent4: The paint fluoresced under the blacklight, creating a neon effect.
meanings.sent5: The jellyfish fluoresced in the dark ocean, lighting up the water around them.
